name: Dolabololo
description:
International Literacy Day
Endangered Language Documentation
Gamkonora is an endangered language in North Halmahera, 
Moluccas. Gamkomnora has a classification as a West 
Papuan Language with 5000 speakers according to 
Ethnologue(2015).
Gamkonora have a Dolabololo as an oral literary tradition. 
Dolabololo is a form of Pantoum in Gamkonoran, Rahban 
Sawal has documenting in 2013. As we know, Pantun not 
only lives in Malay tradition but spread to English and 
French literature known as Pantoum.
